tool.name: python-HTRC wrapper
tool.help:
To get whole volumes: ---------------------
* * input volume ids, one at a line
To get specific pages: ----------------------
* * enter volume ids and pages (or page ranges), one volume at a line. * * you can use individual page numbers (1,2,3) or page ranges (1-3) * * to query for multiple pages or ranges, use comma e.g. 1,3-5,11 * * use pound sign ('#'; without whitespaces) to glue the volume id and pages. e.g. vol_1#1,3-5,11
.. class:: warningmark **You cannot use a mixed form - mixing query for whole volumes and partial volumes will not work**
